Package it.polimi.ingsw.util.printer

Class ColorPrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.util.printer.ColorPrinter
  • public abstract class ColorPrinter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a collection of console-like methods to print formatted and coloured messages, and the CLI interface.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ColorPrinter()  

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private static java.util.List<java.lang.String> accumulateLines​(ColoredString[][] grid)
      This method is used to convert 2-dimensional grid of ColoredStrings into a list of Strings.
      static void clear()
      Clears the underlying command line environment by presenting an empty window with all the text previously displayed being cleared.
      static void err​(java.lang.String message)
      Prints the given message in a red color and after a default prefix: [ERROR].
      static void log​(java.lang.String message)
      Prints the given message in the default console color and after a default prefix: [LOG].
      static void mexC​(java.lang.String message)
      Prints the given message in a yellow color and after a default prefix: [MESSAGE].
      static void mexS​(java.lang.String message)
      Prints the given message in a cyan color and after a default prefix: [MESSAGE].
      static void print​(ColoredString[][] grid)
      Prints a grid of ColoredStrings.
      static void print​(java.lang.String line)
      Prints an inline message.
      private static void printAccumulatedLines​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> lines)
      Prints a series of messages, each on its line.
      static void println​(java.lang.String string)
      Prints a message on a new line.
      static void stat​(java.lang.String message)
      Prints the given message in a green color and after a default prefix: [STATUS].

      • accumulateLines

        private static java.util.List<java.lang.String> accumulateLines​(ColoredString[][] grid)
        This method is used to convert 2-dimensional grid of ColoredStrings into a list of Strings. This is to improve performance and minimize system calls.
        Parameters:
        grid - the grid.
        Returns:
        the list of Strings.

      • printAccumulatedLines

        Prints a series of messages, each on its line.
        Parameters:
        lines - the messages.

        Clears the underlying command line environment by presenting an empty window with all the text previously displayed being cleared.

        Parameters:

      • stat

        public static void stat​(java.lang.String message)

        Parameters:
